attributes.action: Stop creating privately sponsored Academies and invest the money in local state education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are fighting against closing local schools only for them to be reopened as Academies with private sponsors taking away local governance and community involvement.  The Government should invest money and retain ownership in our schools.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Stop creating privately sponsored Academies and invest the money in local state education."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15217.asp
